    #include<bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
    #define ll long long int
    int main()
    {
    int t;
    ll n,m,sum;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    scanf("%lld",&m);
    ll p=n/m;
    ll q=n%m;
    sum=0;
    sum=(p*m*(m-1))/2+(q*(q+1))/2;
    printf("%lld\n",sum);
    }
    return 0;
    }
